message: Starting investigation of quizGenerator.js to understand quiz generation logic
Examined quizGenerator.js and week1.json - analyzing how quiz data is processed and mapped

Investigation COMPLETE: quizGenerator.js analysis finished. KEY FINDING: Generator currently DROPS explanation field. SOLUTION: Add single line 'explanation: q.explanation' to mapping at line 9-13. No filter changes needed. Backward compatible. Explanation field already exists in week data with proper structure. Coordinated with ui-renderer and data-structure agents.
